name: ChangeFont19
description: Changes Font 19 in Geometry Dash to the official Minecraft font.

fontStyle.name: Font Style
fontStyle.description:
<c_>FULL GAME RESTART REQUIRED TO APPLY CHANGES. THIS IS YOUR ONLY WARNING.</c>

Set a particular font style for Font 19.
<cy>Item Counter objects will keep the default</c> <cf>Classic</c> <cy>font style.</c>

Go ahead and <cr>e</c><co>x</c><cs>p</c><cc>e</c><cy>r</c><cg>i</c><cj>m</c><cl>e</c><cb>n</c><ca>t</c>!
<cy>"Monospace" styles (courtesy of IdreesInc) are "bleeding edge"/experimental options and are a smidge uglier.</c>

fontStyleAggression.name: Font Style Aggression
fontStyleAggression.description:
Adjust how aggressively font styles from ChangeFont19 are applied <cy>AFTER the game has finished loading (thanks to technical limitations)</c>.
<cg>Changing this option does not require restarting the game.</c>
<cy>Some texts may keep the default</c> <cf>Classic</c> <cy>style for safety reasons.</c>

Go ahead and <cr>e</c><co>x</c><cs>p</c><cc>e</c><cy>r</c><cg>i</c><cj>m</c><cl>e</c><cb>n</c><ca>t</c>!
<cy>"Monospace" styles (courtesy of IdreesInc) are "bleeding edge"/experimental options and are a smidge uglier.</c>
